title: Rate of change - on an interval

content.prompt: ​The average rate of change of the function g on the interval -1,3 is negative. Which of the following could be the graph of g ?

choices.label:
​

The x axis ranges from negative 4 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 40 to 40 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: 

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 3.9 comma 45). 
  • The curve decreases to cross the x axis at (negative 3 comma 0).
  • The curve continues to decrease, reaching a low point at (negative 1 comma negative 32). 
  • The curve increases to cross the y axis at (0 comma negative 27) and reach the x axis at (3 comma 0). 
  • After reaching a high point on the x axis, the curve decreases to the point (5 comma negative 31) and exits the window at (5.3 comma negative 45).

​

The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 40 to 40 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: 

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 2.5 comma 45). 
  • The curve decreases to cross the x axis at (negative 1 comma 0). 
  • The curve continues to decrease, crossing the y axis at (0 comma negative 8) and reaching a low point at (0.25 comma negative 9). 
  • The curve increases to reach the x axis at (3 comma 0).
  •  After reaching a high point on the x axis, the curve decreases to the point (5 comma negative 25) and exits the window at (5.6 comma negative 45).

​

The x axis ranges from negative 3 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 40 to 40 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: 

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 2.5 comma negative 45). 
  • The curve increases to cross the x axis at (negative 1 comma 0). 
  • The curve continues to increase, crossing the y axis at (0 comma 8) and reaching a high point at (0.25 comma 9). 
  • The curve decreases to reach the x axis at (3 comma 0). 
  • After reaching a low point on the x axis, the curve increases to the point (5 comma 25) and exits the window at (5.6 comma 45).

​

The x axis ranges from negative 4 to 6 in increments of 1. The y axis ranges from negative 40 to 40 in increments of 10. All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: 

  • The curve enters the window at (negative 3.9 comma negative 45). 
  • The curve increases to cross the x axis at (negative 3 comma 0). 
  • The curve continues to increase, reaching a high point at (negative 1 comma 32). 
  • The curve decreases to cross the y axis at (0 comma 27) and reach the x axis at (3 comma 0). 
  • After reaching a low point on the x axis, the curve increases to the point (5 comma 31) and exits the window at (5.3 comma 45).

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
